thread.section_title: Cruisesalefinder Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Cruisesalefinder | cruisesalefinder.com.au
thread.title: Isabella Mclaughlin

author: Isabella Mclaughlin
title: Isabella Mclaughlin
text: I have found Cruisesalefinder an excellent travel agent 3 times now. They have been true to the cruises they are offering with no hidden costs or price rises on the stated journeys. Staff are willing to help you in any way to find the cruise you wish to go on. Also inform you of any differences in prices, ports etc., when needed, before you book.
